TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A disorder of the blood. Some nonmalignant hematologic disorders may lead to leukemia.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "nonmalignant hematologic disorder"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "trastorno hematológico no maligno"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Trastorno de la sangre. Algunos trastornos hematológicos no malignos pueden resultar en leucemia.
